metadata.title: CVE-2016-2456 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The MediaTek Wi-Fi driver in Android before 2016-05-01 on Android Onedevices allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, akainternal bug 27275187.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.

linux-lts-wily: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
